title: Decision of the European Central Bank of 23 December 1999 on the approval of the volume of coin issuance in 2000 (ECB/1999/11)
header:
DECISION OF THE EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK
of 23 December 1999
on the approval of the volume of coin issuance in 2000
(ECB/1999/11)
(2000/9/EC)
THE GOVERNING COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK
main_body:
Approval of the volume of national coins to be issued in 2000
The ECB hereby approves the volume of coins to be issued by the participating Member States in 2000 as described in the following table:
>TABLE>

Final provisions
This Decision is addressed to the participating Member States.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Frankfurt am Main, 23 December 1999.
The President of the ECB
Willem F. DUISENBERG
